channel.title: Sqvrltastic Art Archive
channel.description: Hi, I'm sqvrltastic and I'm a digital artist. Welcome to my website! This is my main place for posting my artwork and sharing my thoughts.

item.title: Website update
item.description: Lots of improvements to general usability, optimization and aesthetics of the site. Including: better details element styling, much better web font optimization, converted every artwork to .avif format and further compressed them and included a link to download a full (.jpg) version under each one, added a lot of new coding resources in the links section. Check it out! üî• And more! But it‚Äôs mostly just code optimization.

item.title: 100 Questions for Webmasters [blog]
item.description: A fun questionaire I found, made by mouseling. I was itching to write something lately and this is a perfect way to warm up my writing muscles. Warning for brutal honesty ahead.

item.title: Censorship is bad, actually [blog]
item.description: I usually prefer to avoid talking about hot-button political issues and controversial topics, but in light of recent events I decided to share my thoughts on the matter because it's closely related to my work and art as a whole.

item.title: Montenegro-chan offering you a cold one [artwork]

description.p: [alt text] Montenegro-chan is holding out a can of beer towards the viewer. She is smirking. There is a speech bubble saying 'Beer?' She is dressed in a traditional montenegrin cap, a t-shirt and a pleated black skirt. She has long black straight hair and is wearing sunglasses.

[alt text] Male dark fantasy assassin spellsword character. He is looking over his shoulder and is holding a sword in his right hand and his left hand is glowing with blue magical light as if readying a spell.

item.title: Website update
item.description: I updated the design of my website! Also, I removed the ‚Äúenter‚Äù page, as well as the ‚Äúcontact‚Äù page and instead I fused it with the ‚Äúhome‚Äù page now. Also I added a few new links and new buttons for my website. Aaand I updated the home page and about me section a bit.

item.title: Website update
item.description: I finally purchased a custom domain (sqvrltastic.art) with Porkbun! ü•≥üéâ I will keep the old free GitHub Pages domain working for a while as a fallback, but I will be replacing all my old links with the new ones and I encourage you to update any as well if you have any materials from my site linked, or if you are subscribed with RSS! This is my first time purchasing a domain so bear with me if I inadvertently break something!

description.p: [alt text] Driller and Scout are looking in each other's eyes in a romantic way. Driller is grinning and Scout is visibly flustered. Driller is holding a C4 satchel.

item.title: Redraw of the Montengrin dignitaries selfie [artwork]

description.p: [alt text] Redraw of the Montengrin dignitaries selfie photo from Vatican. Featuring (from left to right): a man in a sunglasses smilling, a woman with seductive gaze, a man with a disturbed expression on his face and an old man with a tired expression.

item.title: Deep Rock Galactic female roughneck driller dwarf concept [artwork]

description.p: [alt text] A female dwarf is grinning and looking at the viewer while holding a colette wave cooker in her right hand. She is wearing standard driller armor, a protective cap and a fuel tank on her back. She has sideburns and a muscular body.

item.title: Website update
item.description: Added some new useful resource links in the ‚Äúcoding‚Äù and ‚Äúart‚Äù links sections. Added a ‚Äúskip to main‚Äù focusable skip link for accessibility.

item.title: I wish more artists had a personal website... [blog]
item.description: Rambly blog post about wishing for a more human, more enriching web for artists specifically.

description.p: [alt text] elf Kerillian holding a chicken saying "The hell is that? That is just my chicken, Kruber", with Kruber in the background with a mortified expression on his face saying "By Taal..."

item.title: Website update
item.description: Deleted and added some new links. Changed a bit the ‚Äúbuttons‚Äù page; also, I no longer allow hotlinking of my images. Added ‚Äúartwork‚Äù and ‚Äúblog‚Äù tags to RSS items so they are easier to filter out in case you want to. Implemented some minor code improvements regarding the way images are embedded on this website. All in all, nothing major, mostly just polishing work.

description.p: [alt text] Black and white pencil-style sketch portrait of Reinhard von Lohengramm

item.title: Website update
item.description: Updated my ‚ÄúFull guide to RSS‚Äù; added a small section at the bottom about on how to make your RSS feed autodiscoverable. Additionally, added some cool new sites in the ‚Äúlinks‚Äù section. Oh and, you can now find the HUGO source files of this website on my GitHub, if you ever wondered how I made this site the way I did.

item.title: Website update
item.description: I completely remade the template for the RSS news feed and the site‚Äôs own updates feed. Well, mostly on the developer side, you yourself won‚Äôt see many differences. Basically I made a template in HUGO and automated it, whereas previously I would code it by hand, which was pretty tedious and prone to making mistakes. Make sure to clear your reader‚Äôs cache if you have any issues! Also, now every artwork has a small annotation below!

item.title: Kerillian drinking Leaf Lover's Special beer [artwork]

description.p: [alt text] elf Kerillian drinking Leaf Lover's Special beer with an annoyed expression on her face
[alt text] elf Kerillian with a thinking expresion on her face
